titleStmt.title: To all magistrates in Christendom, that do profess Christianity. Concerning Christian gospel-liberty against persecution, and one Christian forcing, persecuting, imprisoning, and spoiling the goods of another, because they will not be of their faith, worship or religion.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

titleStmt.title: To all magistrates in Christendom, that do profess Christianity. Concerning Christian gospel-liberty against persecution, and one Christian forcing, persecuting, imprisoning, and spoiling the goods of another, because they will not be of their faith, worship or religion.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Fox. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
